remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Diagnostics.CounterSampleCalculator.ComputeCounterValue%28System.Diagnostics.CounterSample%29> method overload returns meaningful results only for performance counters of the following <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType>:
- <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType.RawFraction>
- <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType.NumberOfItems32>
- <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType.NumberOfItemsHEX32>
- <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType.NumberOfItems64>
- <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType.NumberOfItemsHEX64>
For other counter types, this overload always returns a value of 0 (zero).
